H0.text: What dramatically fictionalised king actually ruled the Scots 1040-57. Duncan I

H1.text: What dramatically fictionalised king actually ruled the Scots 1040-57. Kenneth III

H2.text: What dramatically fictionalised king actually ruled the Scots 1040-57. Malcolm II

H3.text: What dramatically fictionalised king actually ruled the Scots 1040-57. MacBeth

A5.text: Macbeth murders King Duncan and takes the Scottish throne for himself.
